item.title: git Cherry Pick
item.description: Git cherry-picking Aah picking cherries! ‚ù§Ô∏è I’m using git since I started using linux. Cherry-pick is one of those commands I do alot with git. Right now I’m preparing a new cherry and will pick it later. üòâ What’s cherry-pick? According to man(1) git-cherry-pick: Given one or more existing commits, apply the change each one introduces, recording a new commit for each. This requires your working tree to be clean (no modifications from the HEAD commit).
